events.message: I recently received my order but it's not what I expected. I would like to request a refund because the product does not match the description on your website.
The reported issue has been categorized as a Refund request due to the customer's dissatisfaction and request for money back.
Support agent Julia has been assigned to handle the customer's refund request and to assist with resolving the issue.
Hello, thank you for contacting us. I’m sorry to hear that your order didn’t meet your expectations. I’m here to help with your refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and any photos of the product you received? This will help us process your refund quickly.
My order number is 458392. The product has completely different specifications than listed, so I’ve attached photos showing the discrepancy.
Thank you for the details and photos. We will initiate your refund immediately. Please allow 3-5 business days for the amount to reflect in your account.
Thank you for your quick response and for processing the refund. I appreciate your help resolving this matter so promptly.
We’re glad we could resolve your refund request. If you need any further assistance, please don’t hesitate to get in touch.
Just following up to ensure you have received your refund and that everything is satisfactory. Please let us know if you have any further questions.
Your refund case has been successfully closed. Thank you for shopping with us, and we hope to serve you better in the future.
